algorithm_technique: Greedy approach with sorting by value-to-weight ratio
problem_summary_simple: Fill a bag with items, allowing fractional parts, to maximize total price.
problem_summary_technical: Sorts items by price-to-weight ratio and greedily takes as much as possible from the highest ratio items until capacity is met.
key_insights: This is a fractional knapsack problem.
The optimal strategy is to prioritize items with the highest value-to-weight ratio.
Sorting the items by this ratio allows for a greedy selection.
